title: "What is the significance of the book 'Il mondo magico degli Heroi' in relation to astrology and the ancient concept of man's connection to the cosmos?"
first_phrase: This last part of the text delves further into the spiritual journey and the connection between man and the cosmos. It references works by Julius Evola, Cesare Dalla Riviera, and various ancient traditions, discussing ancient concepts that continue to persist to this day. It explores the idea of integrating oneself and awakening to one's true self, rather than being focused on predictions and particulars. The text also discusses the symbolism of various elements and symbols, including the eagle, the fish, and the letter A. Finally, the text touches on the idea of the active principle and the importance of continuity and vigilance in achieving gnosis.
